title: "reset model poses" doesn't reset visualization correctly

content.raw: When resetting model poses it can happen that objects keep their pose in visualization (including camera sensors) and are only put back to their original position in the physics engine (the visualized collision pose doesn't match the actual collision pose either). It seems like this happens with static objects (tested with the Bookshelf and Cabinet models).
content.html: When resetting model poses it can happen that objects keep their pose in visualization (including camera sensors) and are only put back to their original position in the physics engine (the visualized collision pose doesn't match the actual collision pose either). It seems like this happens with static objects (tested with the Bookshelf and Cabinet models).
